name: Swingy Root
description:
Gameplay:

- Use the left mouse click to catch seeds and put them inside the required materials so you can then use them to kill the enemies approaching you. 

- Once you have a ready seed, pass it to the second root (the one at the bottom) and try to shoot the enemies.

Credits: Programming:
